name: HepatitisAVaccineAdministered
title: Hepatitis A Vaccine Administered
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent procedure codes for hepatitis A vaccine administration.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with hepatitis A vaccine administration codes. This is a grouping of CPT and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
